content: I cannot predict the future, but i can say that lamar jackson has been known for his ability to both pass and run the ball effectively. in his first two seasons in the nfl, jackson had more rushing yards than passing yards. however, in the 2020-2021 season, he had more passing yards than rushing yards. it remains to be seen what strategy the ravens will employ in the upcoming season and how that will affect lamar jackson's performance.
